Radiant Ray. Ranged Attack Roll: +18, range 300 ft.
Hit: 22 (4d10)
Radiant damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the
Prone condition.
Divine Beam (Recharge 5–6). Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 26, each creature
in a 300-foot-long, 10-foot-wide Line.
Failure: 65 (10d12) Radiant damage.
Success: Half damage.
Failure or Success: A creature reduced to 0 Hit
Points by this beam disintegrates into dust, leaving behind any magic items
it was wearing or carrying.
Legendary Actions
Legendary Action Uses: 3. Immediately after another creature’s turn, the
colossus can expend a use to take one of the following actions. The
colossus regains all expended uses at the start of each of its turns.
Smite. The colossus makes one Radiant Ray attack.
Stomp. The colossus moves up to half its Speed without provoking
Opportunity Attacks, and it can make one Slam attack at any point during
that move.
